channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Pothole in carriageway nr 27 Gretton Road Winchcombe, 23rd January
item.description:
In the carriageway (Gretton Road) and very obvious. Due to parking this is effectively the side of the road that carries all the traffic and it's enlarged by around 50% in just a week. It is the top layer of tarmac being compromised, exposing the lower layer.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 41, Gretton Road, Winchcombe, Winchcombe
Report on FixMyStreet

item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Flooded gutters, 23rd January
item.description:
Continuing problem, reported at least 3 times. Inadequate drainage system. Overflowing drains for week outside Roseville and affecting several properties from there towards Cheltenham. Difficulty leaving properties on foot for example outside 1 Little Hills Cottages due to the amount of flooding outside the house and traffic driving through the water at speed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Shurdington Road, Shurdington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
